title: Should I buy aatrox, fizz or wukong
body: I have been thinking about buying a new champion. I really want aatrox, fizz or wukong, who should i get?

replies.body: All are great choices. You can't go wrong. Aatrox seems abit out of meta, not feeling really impactful unless you get ahead. Fizz is always reliable and wukong has great power spikes
Do you play top, jungle or mid most? That would impact your choice.
WuKong brings the most to a team comp i reckon, and hes pretty strong top lane
